text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the militia consists of able-bodied individuals who are:
citizens of the State;
citizens of the United States who take an oath of allegiance to the State; or
of foreign birth and who:
are residents of the State; and
have declared their intention to become citizens of the State.

An individual exempted under subsection (b)(3) through (12) of this section shall be available for military duty in case of war, insurrection, or invasion, or when the danger of war, insurrection, or invasion is imminent.
